      • activateActiveBuses

        public void activateActiveBuses(int offset)
        Activate buses if some sort of time jump is made in application (first start, time change, ..) Will activate all buses already on road, that means local time is somewhere between their start and end time
        Parameters:
        offset - if offset is equal to zero, method is activating buses from range midnight to actual time, if greater than zero, method is activating buses from range (midnight - offset) to midnight

      • resetBuses

        public void resetBuses()
        Deactivate all buses and paint them again with new information, used if data dictating bus position were changed

        Setter for 'holder'
        Parameters:
        holder - data holder
